question: Calculate the length of Line_B_B.
qt_description: Line Line_B_B (Description: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L3 (foot B on extension))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a complete circle (center O1, init point circle_1) with radius 5. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: circle (center O1) scaled by 2 (new radius 10). Round 2: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed 3-sided polygon (center O1) around circle. Found 8 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 6 new lines and 7 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 9, total arcs: 9, total points: 8.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L3 (foot B on extension)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a large circle centered at O1 with radius 10 circumscribes an equilateral triangle ABC, with vertices A, B, and C lying on the circle. A smaller concentric circle centered at O1 with radius 5 is inscribed within triangle ABC, tangent to its sides at points D, E, and F. Line L3 is defined as the line segment AC. From point B, a perpendicular is dropped to line L3, and its foot lies on the extension of L3 beyond point C, denoted as point B'.

Calculate the length of segment BB'.
